actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.
Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 93-32.
Measure failed of passage in House, roll call #28 (153-234).

official_title: A resolution authorizing the Committee on the District of Columbia to conduct studies and investigations.

summary.text: Authorizes the House Committee on the District of Columbia to conduct studies and investigations within its jurisdiction. Requires the committee to submit to the House, not later than January 2, 1975, a report on the activities of that committee during the Congress ending at noon on January 3, 1975.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing the Committee on the District of Columbia to conduct studies and investigations.
